description.value: Through rigorous training, you have strengthened your wings, granting you enough thrust to gain additional altitude. When you make a horizontal @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap], increase the distance by 10 feet up to a maximum of your Speed. Any fly Speed granted by ancestry feats and other permanent wings increases by 5 feet.

value.value: you have permanent wings (such as from an ancestry or graft)
